Name: Fruit Girls: Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio

Want to seduce her? You'll have to impress this beauty with physical and intellectual prowess! FRUIT SALAD : Are you ready for a grand finale? We put together the five Fruit Girls for a very special essay. As expected our lovely Nerin got attention from both Lollaia and Amphira as soon as we organized the setting of the photoshoot and Rhenelis put Junipher to work hard on her in exchange for workout tips. GAME FEATURES : Hot hentai girls with distinctive looks and unique personalities! A delicious Fruit Salad scene where all Fruit Girls participate! Customize your experience and difficulty level at will! See all girls that you have unlocked in one place! Unique holidays costumes for each girl! Original music with a lo-fi feel! Sexy sound effects recorded by a real voice actress! Multiple achievements! Extra content in free updates!
